CustomField.formula: IF(( Opportunities_Agreements_Sent__c + Opportunities_Application_In__c + Opportunities_Application_Missing_In__c + Opportunities_Approved__c + Opportunities_Closed_Lost__c + Opportunities_Closed_Won__c + Opportunities_Declined__c + Opportunities_Default__c + Opportunities_Funded__c + Opportunities_Ready_to_Submit__c + Opportunities_Renewals__c + Opportunities_Signed__c + Opportunities_Underwriting__c ) == 0, 0, (Opportunities_Closed_Won__c / ( Opportunities_Agreements_Sent__c + Opportunities_Application_In__c + Opportunities_Application_Missing_In__c + Opportunities_Approved__c + Opportunities_Closed_Lost__c + Opportunities_Closed_Won__c + Opportunities_Declined__c + Opportunities_Default__c + Opportunities_Funded__c + Opportunities_Ready_to_Submit__c + Opportunities_Renewals__c + Opportunities_Signed__c + Opportunities_Underwriting__c )))
CustomField.label: Actual - Apps>Funded%
